alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 9:39PM CDT until October 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Widespread sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees expected. Localized temperatures in the upper 20s expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Iowa, southwest Minnesota, northeast Nebraska and central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
